title.value: Оптимизация посевных площадей зерновых и зернобобовых культур
Optimization of sowing areas for grain and leguminous crops
Optimization of sowing areas for grain and leguminous crops

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kalyuk, V.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: In article by an example of the Grodno region of the Republic of Belarus there was undertaken an attempt by means of economic-mathematical modeling to solve optimizing problems of establishment of the optimum sizes of cultivated areas of grain and pulse crops. The Microsoft Exel and LPX88 programs were for this purpose used. Practical application of the received results will allow to optimize essentially at level of the Grodno region volume of production both food, and fodder grain and in the long term to increase its reception in researched region by 43,0 % concerning to present level.
